Constructor Detail

Argument

public Argument(ArgumentType type,
                java.lang.String flag,
                java.lang.String headerMessage,
                java.lang.String bodyMessage,
                java.lang.Boolean required)

No default constructor - all values must be passed in, even if they are null.

Parameters:
type - Type of argument - either NORMAL (key=value pair like --file foo.txt), SINGLETON (just a key flag like -help) or NAKED (just an unflagged parameter like file.txt)
flag - For NORMAL and SINGLETON types only - the flag used to set the argument (e.g. for "--file foo.txt", the flag is "file")
headerMessage - The brief description of how to set the argument in the header (e.g. "--file ")
bodyMessage - The detailed description of what the argument is used for (e.g. "--file - sets the file this program will read in")
required - Whether the parameter is required or not
